ygData.subject: Re: They want us to interact
ygData.msgSnippet: ... the oven only 1.5p use them ... I will Admit I made 40p ... be more acceptable shoot ... interests. ... roleplaying game on the net goto www.everquest.com
ygData.messageBody:
---LOPSTER1@... wrote:
>
> From: LOPSTER1@...
>
> What shall we do now run though the ZONE!
>
> "Get your Pie Tins red hot Pie Tins fresh out of
the oven only 1.5p use them
> for frisbees or making pies or what ever you want."
>
> all they have to do lower the dang Profit margins.
I will Admit I made 40p
> in an hour and it was great but I think 7.5p should
be more acceptable shoot
> I can make that fighting in High Hold(in an hour).
>
> Sirlip of Fennin Ro
> Level 18 Paladin
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor
----------------------------
>
> ONElist: your connection to people who share your
interests.
>
>
------------------------------------------------------------------------
> For more information on how to join the best
roleplaying game on the net goto www.everquest.com
>
I really think we should all email verrant. Because,
they are taking a lot of the fun out of the gameby
doing this. Why the hell have those skills at all if
nbody profits from it? who is going to use a pie tin?
A baker won't... because they took the profit out of
baking.

Who really cares if somebody wants to stand at the
pottery wheel and make 30 - 40 plat an hour? Not
me... all Verant is doing is really making this a
power game. the less profitable our skills become...
the more camping and kill stealing you are going to
see. Not to mention high level characters running
through newbie zones justr to make some quick dough.

I uderstand that they want us to interract... but I
was interacting plenty when I was able to make my
money off of my pie tin making skill. I think they
are making things far too difficult. And, if this
continues... i for one don't know how much longer I
will play EQ.

Verant wants you to play it the way THEY want you to
play it and I just don't think that it is right or
fair. If I want to do nothing but stand and make pie
tins all day, or bake pies, or make beer, to make
money... that should be my buisness... trust me... I
allways return to the party situation. As a troll I
didn't make much off of it at all... MAYBE 20 plat an
hour. They shoudl NOT do away with the profit margin
all together. Lower it or something... or at least
make the dambned skikll useful for god sake!

This is realy aggravating me... I am going to stop
now before I cancel my account. Yes... I'm that upset
over this.

-Kenny
